name: Undecided (Shabooya)
description:
You can view the source here https://github.com/cmoats/Undecided

Controls:

WASD for movement

Our take on the theme was that you recently just died and now you're embarking on a spiritual journey to the afterlife. We didn't have enough time to finish so unfortunately there is no story and it's pretty unpolished
